siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
Synopsis: After Chris McLean's court hearing does not go as planned, twelve classic Total Drama contestants find themselves swept up in a new installment of the once infamous reality show, some willingly and some very unwillingly.

Well, it's finally here. 
Thank you too everyone who has made this project possible, this show was a staple of not only my childhood, but the childhoods and lives of many others as well. 

Wiki: https://total-drama-reunion.fandom.com/wiki/Total_Drama_Reunion_Wiki

CAST
______________________________________________
Chris McLean -------------------------- Jacuto
Trent & Geoff --------------------------- N8
Courtney & Eva------------------------- Rachel Glait
Gwen --------------------------------------- Meghan McConnell
Owen --------------------------------------- Matt Lamar
Alejandro --------------------------------- Michael Kim
Cody ---------------------------------------- SoggyEchidna
Duncan ------------------------------------ Dylan Clark
Heather ------------------------------------ Kenkoy
Bridgette ---------------------------------- Veronica Nino
Judge Thompson & Jan ---------- Celina Atangana
Reynold Chaddington -------------- Ben Potter
LeShawna -------------------------------- Jessica Williams-Daley
Kelsey -------------------------------------- Glass Peregrine
Tom ----------------------------------------- WowSuchGaming
Jerry ---------------------------------------- Noahh
Lewis --------------------------------------- Deric Jackman
The Creature ---------------------------- Tanner McNatt

ANIMATORS
______________________________________________
Adam Bluboi
AJ Winter

Follow the crew members below!

Synopsis: After Chris McLean's court hearing does not go as planned, twelve classic Total Drama contestants find themselves swept up in a new installment of the once infamous reality show, some willingly and some very unwillingly.

Well, it's finally here. 
Thank you too everyone who has made this project possible, this show was a staple of not only my childhood, but the childhoods and lives of many others as well.

blogPost.title: TOTAL DRAMA REUNION - EP 1 - Reunited and it Feels No Good Part 1
blogPost.author: Blu Productions

localize.title: TOTAL DRAMA REUNION - EP 1 - Reunited and it Feels No Good Part 1 - 重聚，感觉不好。
localize.description:
简介： 在克里斯-麦克莱恩的法庭听证会没有如期举行之后，十二位经典的《全剧》选手发现自己被卷入了这个曾经臭名昭著的真人秀节目的新一期中，有些人是心甘情愿的，有些人则是非常不甘心的。

好了，它终于来了。
感谢每一个让这个项目成为可能的人，这个节目不仅是我童年的主旋律，也是许多人童年和生活的主旋律。

维基：https://total-drama-reunion.fandom.com/wiki/Total_Drama_Reunion_Wiki

CAST
______________________________________________
Chris McLean -------------------------- Jacuto
Trent & Geoff --------------------------- N8
Courtney & Eva------------------------- Rachel Glait
Gwen --------------------------------------- Meghan McConnell
Owen --------------------------------------- Matt Lamar
Alejandro --------------------------------- Michael Kim
科迪 ---------------------------------------- SoggyEchidna
Duncan ------------------------------------ Dylan Clark
Heather ------------------------------------ Kenkoy
Bridgette ---------------------------------- Veronica Nino
Thompson法官和Jan ---------- Celina Atangana。
Reynold Chaddington -------------- Ben Potter
LeShawna -------------------------------- Jessica Williams-Daley
Kelsey -------------------------------------- Glass Peregrine

Jerry ---------------------------------------- Noahh
Lewis --------------------------------------- Deric Jackman
The Creature ---------------------------- Tanner McNatt

localize.title: TOTAL DRAMA REUNION - EP 1 - Reunited and it Feels No Good Part 1 - 重聚，感覺不好。
localize.description:
簡介： 在克里斯-麥克萊恩的法庭聽證會沒有如期舉行之後，十二位經典的《全劇》選手發現自己被捲入了這個曾經臭名昭著的真人秀節目的新一期中，有些人是心甘情願的，有些人則是非常不甘心的。

好了，它終於來了。
感謝每一個讓這個項目成爲可能的人，這個節目不僅是我童年的主旋律，也是許多人童年和生活的主旋律。

維基：https://total-drama-reunion.fandom.com/wiki/Total_Drama_Reunion_Wiki

previous.excerpt:
Jordan Belfort is an American author and former stockbroker who inspired The Wolf of Wall Street. He speaks to Sky News about his opinion of the 'short squeeze' being experienced by GameStop, and gives his advice to investors.

SUBSCRIBE to our YouTube channel for more videos: http://www.youtube.com/skynews
 
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/skynews 
 
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/skynews
 
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/skynews
 
For more content go to http://news.sky.com and download our apps: 
 
Apple: https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/sky-news/id316391924?mt=8
 
Android https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bskyb.skynews.android&hl=en_GB

Sky News videos are now available in Spanish here/Los video de Sky News están disponibles en español aquí https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzG5BnqHO8oNlrPDW9CYJog
previous.title: GameStop: The real Wolf of Wall Street's advice

localize.title: GameStop：华尔街之狼的真实建议
localize.description:
乔丹-贝尔福特是一位美国作家，也是前股票经纪人，他的灵感来自《华尔街之狼》。他向Sky News讲述了他对GameStop所经历的 "空头挤压 "的看法，并给出了他对投资者的建议。

订阅我们的YouTube频道，查看更多视频：http://www.youtube.com/skynews。
 
在Twitter上关注我们：https://twitter.com/skynews 
 
在Facebook上喜欢我们：https://www.facebook.com/skynews
 
在Instagram上关注我们：https://www.instagram.com/skynews
 
更多内容请登录http://news.sky.com，下载我们的应用程序。
 
苹果：https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/sky-news/id316391924?mt=8
 
Android https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bskyb.skynews.android&hl=en_GB

天空新闻视频现在有西班牙文版/Los video de Sky News están disponibles en español aquí https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzG5BnqHO8oNlrPDW9CYJog。

localize.title: GameStop：華爾街之狼的真實建議
localize.description:
喬丹-貝爾福特是一位美國作家，也是前股票經紀人，他的靈感來自《華爾街之狼》。他向Sky News講述了他對GameStop所經歷的 "空頭擠壓 "的看法，並給出了他對投資者的建議。

訂閱我們的YouTube頻道，查看更多視頻：http://www.youtube.com/skynews。
 
在Twitter上關注我們：https://twitter.com/skynews 
 
在Facebook上喜歡我們：https://www.facebook.com/skynews
 
在Instagram上關注我們：https://www.instagram.com/skynews
 
更多內容請登錄http://news.sky.com，下載我們的應用程序。
 
蘋果：https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/sky-news/id316391924?mt=8
 
Android https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bskyb.skynews.android&hl=en_GB

天空新聞視頻現在有西班牙文版/Los video de Sky News están disponibles en español aquí https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzG5BnqHO8oNlrPDW9CYJog。

next.excerpt:
Pink hair? Check. Poofy dress? Double check! Charley is here to brighten your day and bring in the new year. Let’s have a great 2021!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mentioned in Video:
@Moonlight Jewel 
Charlotte the Cake Shop Lolita Doll’s video: https://youtu.be/MvQqU4zYpYM
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Merchandise: https://www.zazzle.com/store/dollightful/collections
https://society6.com/dollightful
Doll clothing patterns here: https://www.etsy.com/shop/DollightfulPatterns
Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest: @dollightfully
New to customizing? Start here! https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwf5az3O7M4eS697rBmAg269LYwr4QDzy
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MATERIALS:
Thrifted yarn (50 cents)
Reroot needles from the https://thedollplanet.com/
Water Colored Pencils - Faber Castell
Pastels - Mungyo Hand-Rolled Soft Pastels
Acrylic paint – Liquitex brand
Mr. Super Clear UV Flat (wear a mask and spray in a ventilated area!)
MASK: Organic Vapor Particle Respirator Mask
High Gloss Varnish -Liquitex Brand
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Musical tracks from:
Artlist https://artlist.io 
[Songs listed chronologically:]
In Circles by Evgeny Bardyusha 
Night and Day Instrumental Version by Rex Banner
Oceans by Rex Banner
Doorknob by Egon Stone
Lesson Learned Instrumental Version by Daniel Robinson 
Next Chapter by Out of Flux
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Logo and other graphics designed by: https://charliesparksdesign.myportfolio.com/
#repaint #doll #lolitafashion
next.title: Repaint! Charley the Lolita Fashion Doll #OOAK Art Doll

localize.title: 重涂！夏莉洛丽塔时尚娃娃#OOAK艺术娃娃
localize.description:
粉红色的头发？检查。蓬蓬裙？双重检查！夏利在这里照亮你的一天，带来新的一年。让我们有一个伟大的2021年!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
视频中提到的。
@Moonlight Jewel 
夏洛特蛋糕店洛丽塔娃娃的视频：https://youtu.be/MvQqU4zYpYM。
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
商品：https://www.zazzle.com/store/dollightful/collections
https://society6.com/dollightful
娃娃服装图案这里：https://www.etsy.com/shop/DollightfulPatterns
Instagram, Twitter, Pinterest: @dollightfully
新手定制？从这里开始！https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwf5az3O7M4eS697rBmAg269LYwr4QDzy
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
材料。
二手纱线(50美分)
重根针从https://thedollplanet.com/。
水彩铅笔 - Faber Castell (Faber Castell)
粉彩 - Mungyo手卷软粉彩
丙烯酸涂料-Liquitex品牌
超清UV平先生（戴上口罩，在通风的地方喷！）。
MASK: 有机蒸汽粒子呼吸器口罩
高光泽度清漆-立基达品牌。
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
音乐曲目来自
艺人 https://artlist.io 
[歌曲按时间顺序排列：]
叶夫根尼-巴尔迪乌沙的《圆圈》。
雷克斯-班纳的《夜与日》器乐版
雷克斯-班纳的《海洋
门把手 by Egon Stone
经验教训》器乐版由丹尼尔-罗宾逊演奏。
下一章由失控
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
标志和其他图形设计：https://charliesparksdesign.myportfolio.com/
#重绘#娃娃#lolitafashion
